channel.title: Load patch from sd card automatically upon insert?
channel.description: Say I want to use axo core as a standalone audio fx device, with no external controls, powered by an adapter, and I have various sd cards, each one with a different patch on it. How would I make axo load a patch from the sd card automatically, so I would be able to switch patches simply by inserting a different sd card?

item.title: Load patch from sd card automatically upon insert?
item.dc:creator: @MC_DETH
item.description:
@MC_DETH wrote:

Thanks for your replies. I really like the way this community works. Yeah I know a controller would be much more efficient, it's just something I was wondering about because it will take me a while before I get the hang of this midi controller thing and feel comfortable enough to take it into a live performance situation. Creating some nice effects and being able to change them around by changing sd cards is something that can't easily go wrong I suppose (apart from losing the sd card).

Read full topic
item.source: Load patch from sd card automatically upon insert?

item.title: Load patch from sd card automatically upon insert?
item.dc:creator: @strum
item.description:
@strum wrote:

lokki:

put them all on one scared and select via program change midi for example

Yep that's another way to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Load patch from sd card automatically upon insert?

item.title: Load patch from sd card automatically upon insert?
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

MC_DETH:

I have various sd cards, each one with a different patch on it.

why? put them all on one scared and select via program change midi for example. or go with a rotary encoder and display as @strum suggested. but with a midi-controller you can change patches quite easily in standalone mode.

Read full topic
item.source: Load patch from sd card automatically upon insert?

item.title: Load patch from sd card automatically upon insert?
item.dc:creator: @strum
item.description:
@strum wrote:

from the patcher upload the patch to the sdcard as the startup patch on each of the sdcards. Insert required card and power cycle the Axo.

A better way would be add a rotary encoder and, optionally, a display so you could select patches from one card. It would be more convenient and faster.

Read full topic
